home.question: What is YOUR?
home.answer: YOUR is the Web3 foundation for the future of product content. YOUR is an open source protocol that brings creators, curators, node operators, and content distributors together to collectively provide high-quality product content in Web3 e-commerce markets.

home.question: Who is behind the company?
home.answer: YOUR is co-founded and run by a group of highly talented people who have vast experience in blockchain technology, development. marketing and e-commerce. For more information, take a look at the about us page.

home.question: What problem is YOUR protocol solving?
home.answer: The existing system of product content creation and distribution is plagued with problems that affect both businesses and consumers. Current problems involve the lack of control over product content, inefficiency and waste in creating and storing product content, and a lack of complete and high-quality product information. YOUR protocol aims to solve these problems through a decentralised, transparent, efficient and fair network. Creators can register their ownership in smart contracts, ensuring complete control over their content. Curation ensures only high-quality content is available to end-users, and decentralised storage prevents inefficient content duplicates and waste.

home.question: How is YOUR protocol creating and distributing product content?
home.answer: YOUR offers an open source protocol for Web3 and Web2 e-commerce environments, to use (stream) the co-created, co-owned, curated and decentralised stored product content through dApps.

home.question: What do we mean by product content?
home.answer: By product content we mean any information about a product the consumer needs in order to make a purchase decision. This could be an image, but also a product description or a review

home.question: How does YOUR protocol ensure product content quality?
home.answer: YOUR ensures content quality through curation. Protocol users curating each others' content ensures only high-quality product content is available to end-users, which in turn provides a better shopping experience and increases the conversion rate for e-commerce businesses.

home.question: How can I contribute to YOUR protocol?
home.answer: Creators, distributors, developers and storage nodes can all contribute to YOUR Protocol. Learn more on how to start building on YOUR protocol on https://info.your.io/hc/en-nl/sections/10067369469213-Build

home.question: What is the earn and reward mechanism offered by YOUR protocol?
home.answer: YOUR protocol offers an earn and reward mechanism, where all parties in the ecosystem are rewarded a fair share for their contributions. These parties include content creators, owners, curators, and network nodes. Transactions consist of views or consumption of Web3 product content in return for micropayments.

home.question: How does YOUR protocol give control to creators?
home.answer: YOUR protocol registers shared content ownership in smart contracts. This gives creators complete control over their creations and the ability to easily change or revoke content as needed.

home.question: $YOUR token?
home.answer: The protocol operates on its own token to facilitate all contributions on the network. YOUR token is crucial in the protocol transactions/working. Create, control, distribute and secure the protocol through the token. Buy our token at TGE on one of the representing exchanges.

home.question: Who are partners of YOUR?
home.answer: With the support from various reputable names in the blockchain industry, YOUR has successfully closed its funding rounds with investment from Venture capital firms like Stratos, Genblock Capital and Skyvision Capital. Together with the fast growing team, backers and strategic partners we want to make our vision a reality.

home.question: How do I contact YOUR?
home.answer: Submit a request through https://info.your.io/hc/en-nl/requests/new with your question or concern if you have any questions or remarks. Our support team will get back to you as soon as possible. During office hours, our chatbot Lisa is available on YOUR for immediate help.
